unexpected_error.title: Whoopsie!
unexpected_error.apology: Sorry for the inconvenience. Feel free to try again later.
unexpected_error.reported: This incident was reported to the developers.

discord.title: ${unexpected_error.title}
discord.description: It seems we're currently having trouble communicating with Discord. ${unexpected_error.apology}

database.title: ${unexpected_error.title}
database.description: It looks like there is currently a problem with our database. ${unexpected_error.apology}

unknown.title: ${unexpected_error.title}
unknown.description: Unfortunately your command could not be handled due to something unexpected going wrong. ${unexpected_error.apology}

overflow.title: ${unexpected_error.title}
overflow.description: It looks like Discord can't handle the amount of awesomeness I am trying to send you. ${unexpected_error.apology}

position.title: Invalid Position
position.description: Please pick a valid Bridge Scrims position and try again!

role.title: Invalid Role
role.description: Please pick a valid discord role and try again!

config_key.title: Invalid Config Key
config_key.description: Please pick a valid key to configure and try again!

user_unidentified.title: Invalid User
user_unidentified.description: %s has not been added to our system yet. Please choose someone else or try again later.

position_expiration.title: Invalid Expiration
position_expiration.description: Please use a valid duration between 1 minute and 100 years and try again.

kill.name: kill
kill.description: Used to kill the bot cleanly.

exit_option.name: exit_code
exit_option.description: The exit code to exit the process with.

send.name: send
send.description: Used to send pre configured messages.

message_option.name: message
message_option.description: The identifier of the message you would like to send.

position_roles.name: position-roles
position_roles.description: Set up meaningful roles for the application.

position_option.name: position
position_option.description: The role of this role in this application

add.name: add
add.description: Connect a role to a position

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Disconnect a role from a position

find.name: find
find.description: Use this to find Discord users.

user_option.name: user-resolvable
user_option.description: Either the user's ID or tag

case_option.name: case_sensitive
case_option.description: If the query should be matched case sensitive [Default: False]

vouches.name: vouches
vouches.description: Use this command to display a players vouches.

user_option.name: user
user_option.description: The user to show the vouches of. (Default: YOU)

rank_option.name: rank
rank_option.description: What rank to show vouches for. (Default: Next Rank)

expired_option.name: show_expired
expired_option.description: If expired vouches should also be showed. (Default: False)

vouch.name: vouch
vouch.description: Use this command to vouch for someone.

rank_option.name: rank
rank_option.description: What rank to vouch someone for. (Default: Next Rank)

remove_vouch.name: remove-vouches
remove_vouch.description: Use this command to remove someone's vouches.

user_option.name: user
user_option.description: The user to remove the vouches from.

rank_option.name: rank
rank_option.description: What rank to remove vouches for. (Default: Next Rank)

devouch.name: devouch
devouch.description: Use this command to devouch someone.

rank_option.name: rank
rank_option.description: What rank to devouch someone for. (Default: Next Rank)

deny_app.name: deny-app
deny_app.description: Use this command to deny somebody's application.

accept_app.name: accept-app
accept_app.description: Use this command to accept somebody's application.

purge.name: purge
purge.description: Use this command to remove purge someone down a rank.

user_option.name: user
user_option.description: The user that should be purged.

reason_option.name: reason
reason_option.description: Why is this person getting purged?

config.name: config
config.description: Used to configure the bot for this Discord server.

key_option.name: key
key_option.description: What exactly are you trying to configure?

val_option.name: value
val_option.description: What value would you like to assign this key?

round_option.name: round
round_option.description: The round number you would like to start.

length_option.name: length
length_option.description: The amount of days this round should last.

grace_period_option.name: grace_period
grace_period_option.description: The grace period length in minutes.

game_score_option.name: game§{0}
game_score_option.description: The score of game §{0} written as {winner's points}-{loser's points} (e.g. 5-0)

keep_channel_option.name: keep_channel
keep_channel_option.description: If the channel should NOT be deleted. (Default: False)

party.invalid_people: You can not do this with bots or yourself!
party.no_party: You must be in a party to use this command!
party.recovered:

party.missing_scrims_users: Some of these people have not yet been properly identified by the Bridge Scrims system. Please try again in a moment.

role_access_warning:
⚠️ I am missing permissions to give/remove this role! 
Make sure that §{0} has permission to `Manage Roles`, that this role is not already being managed and that in **Server Settings** -> **Roles** §{0} is above §{1}.

blocked_cancel: I am currently restarting. Please try again in a minute.
